name: William Barr
summary: Former Attorney General who was one of Trump's most loyal defenders but broke with him after the 2020 election, calling Trump's fraud claims 'bullshit' and later saying Trump is unfit for office.

keyStatements.quote: We realized from the beginning it was just bullshit.
Someone who engaged in that kind of bullying about a process that is fundamental to our system and to our self-government shouldn't be anywhere near the Oval Office.
keyStatements.context: On Trump's pressure campaign to overturn 2020 election

keyStatements.quote: He's become a consummate narcissist. He has less of an interest in patriotism or policy than he does in himself.

timeline.significance: Second time serving as AG (first under George H.W. Bush)

timeline.event: Announced no evidence of widespread election fraud

timeline.significance: Left after refusing to back fraud claims

timeline.event: Said Trump shouldn't be near Oval Office

credibility.background: Former Attorney General under two presidents, former CIA General Counsel, conservative legal scholar

oppositionReasons: Trump's election fraud claims were baseless 'bullshit'
Trump bullied officials to overturn election results
Trump has become a consummate narcissist
Trump cares more about himself than patriotism or policy

endorsement: Says Trump shouldn't be president but will vote for him over Biden/Harris
